charges.charge_description: 21:963=NI.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE FIVE KILOGRAMS OF COCAINE WITH INTENT TO IMPORT INTO THE U.S.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 39 months as to Counts 1, 2, and 3, to run concurrently. Reduced from original term of imprisonment by DE# 172. Supervised release for a period of 3 years as to Counts 1, 2, and 3, to run concurrently.
